biography_text: CÁRDENAS, Tony, a Representative from California; born in San Fernando, Los Angeles County, Calif., March 31, 1963; B.A., University of California, Santa Barbara, Calif., 1986; realtor; insurance agent; member of the California state assembly, 1996-2002; member of the Los Angeles, Calif., city council, 2003-2013; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
